ComicInfo.Summary: Back in her studio trying out her new talents, Vicki decides to take a trip to Eastern Europe with her new assistant, Lisa, to follow a lead on a cult of vampires! Pretorius's clean, supple linework enhances the perverse sexual shock of this wicked B/D comics series! Women in chains, as you like 'em!
